metadata.title: CVE-2022-3111 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.16-rc6.free_charger_irq() in drivers/power/supply/wm8350_power.c lacks free ofWM8350_IRQ_CHG_FAST_RDY, which is registered in wm8350_init_charger().

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3111` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-35-generic - 5.15.0-35.36
linux-image-5.15.0-35-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-35.36
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-35-generic - 5.15.0-35.36
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-35-generic-64k - 5.15.0-35.36
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1008-kvm - 5.15.0-1008.8
No subscription required
